Program.Name: cmas2d_customlib
Program.ShortDescription: Calculates the center of mass of a 2D object
Program.Description: Calculates the center of mass of a 2D object. Uses the same solver module as cmas2d problemtype, but in this case the new CustomLIB of GUI creation is used.
Program.NewsInVersion: * Changed from CompassLib to CustomLib and use GiD groups
